# Testnet Faucet Aggregator

> A free, searchable directory of 90+ blockchain testnet faucets. Find free testnet ETH, USDC, SOL, BTC, and other tokens across all major chains. No wallet connection, no signup.

## What this tool does

Testnet Faucet Aggregator collects every known blockchain testnet faucet into one searchable directory. Developers can filter by chain, token, testnet, and safety level to find working faucets instantly.

## Supported chains and testnets

- Ethereum: Sepolia, Holesky, Hoodi
- Solana: Devnet, Testnet
- Polygon: Amoy
- Arbitrum: Sepolia
- Optimism: Sepolia
- Base: Sepolia
- Avalanche: Fuji
- BSC: Testnet
- Bitcoin: Testnet 4, Signet
- ZetaChain: Testnet
- Zcash: Testnet
- zkSync: Sepolia
- Starknet: Sepolia
- Scroll: Sepolia
- Linea: Sepolia
- Mantle: Sepolia
- Blast: Sepolia
- Sui: Testnet, Devnet
- Aptos: Testnet
- Near: Testnet
- Cosmos: Testnet
- Polkadot: Westend, Rococo
- Fantom: Testnet
- Algorand: Testnet
- XRP Ledger: Testnet
- TRON: Shasta, Nile
- TON: Testnet
- Injective: Testnet
- MANTRA: Dukong
- Celo: Sepolia
- 0g: Galileo
- Movement: Bardock
- Somnia: Shannon

## Supported assets

ETH, SOL, POL, BTC, USDC, USDT, AVAX, BNB, SUI, APT, NEAR, ATOM, FTM, ALGO, XRP, TRX, MNT, LINK, WETH, PYUSD, EIGEN, INJ, OM, CELO, OG, MOVE, STT, TON, TOS, ZETA, ZEC, WND, ROC

## Safety features

- Verified badges: Green shield icon indicates official faucets run by chain teams or major providers (Alchemy, Infura, Google Cloud, Circle)
- Safety filter: "Address Only" faucets only need a wallet address (safest). "Wallet Required" faucets need wallet connection (e.g. MetaMask)
- This site never connects to wallets, never asks for signatures, never distributes tokens

## Popular faucet queries

### Sepolia faucet
Get free Sepolia testnet ETH from: Alchemy (0.1 ETH/day), QuickNode (0.1 ETH/day), Google Cloud Web3 (0.05 ETH/day), Chainlink (0.1 ETH/day), Infura, PoW Faucet (no signup), Polygon Faucet, Optimism Console.

### Holesky faucet
Holesky is Ethereum's staking testnet. Get Holesky ETH from QuickNode (requires account + wallet connection). Used for testing validator and staking operations.

### Solana devnet faucet
Official Solana faucet at faucet.solana.com (GitHub auth). Sol Faucet at solfaucet.com supports Devnet + Testnet without signup. Google Cloud Web3 provides Solana Devnet PYUSD.

### Polygon Amoy faucet
Get Polygon Amoy POL, WETH, USDC from: Polygon Faucet (address only, no wallet), Alchemy (0.1 POL/day), QuickNode.

### Testnet ETH
Available across Sepolia, Holesky, Hoodi (Ethereum L1), plus Arbitrum Sepolia, Optimism Sepolia, Base Sepolia, and more L2 testnets.

### Testnet USDC
Circle's faucet (faucet.circle.com) provides USDC for Ethereum Sepolia, Arbitrum Sepolia, Optimism Sepolia, Base Sepolia â€” no wallet connection needed. 1 USDC per 2 hours.

## URL

https://testnet-faucet-aggregator.vercel.app
